Employees see the potential career benefits of upskilling and are eager to learn new skills, suggesting leaders need to place more value on the talent they already have within the organisation

77%

of digital workers are extremely interested or very interested in obtaining training in at least one new digital skill

93%

of workers who already have a high degree of technical proficiency express interest in growing their skill set

69%

of workers who generally use basic digital skills (such as email or productivity software) want to undergo additional technology training
